data.title: Mad Love | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Mad Love on digital and stream instantly or download offline. Heartthrob Chris O'Donnell and the seductive Drew Barrymore fall hard in Mad Love - the wild and sexy story of two passionate young people who take to the road for the incredible adventure of their lives! Straitlaced Matt (O'Donnell) is immediately captivated by Casey (Barrymore), the beautiful and unpredictably rebellious new girl in town who refuses to play by the rules! But when they're faced with permanent separation, they decide to leave everything behind and run away together...and run head-on into the kind of passion, fun and excitement you won't soon forget!
data.text:
It's like several of MTV's "Alternative Nation" videos strung together, occasionally interrupted by dialogue.

April 26, 2022

Despite the old-fashioned ideology, at least Mad Love is good to look at.

June 21, 2017

Though well-acted by Chris O'Donnell and Drerw Barrymore, this is yet another version of amour fou and love on the run that makes little sense and fails to reach the heart.

June 21, 2017
